name: cuteTodoList
description:
Manage automatically todo lists with priority and icons.

screenshot : http://img198.imageshack.us/gal.php?g=cutetodoclinux.png

Tested on :
- Windows XP/Vista/7
- Ubuntu 9.04 (GVim && Vim)
install_details:
drop the files in your ~/.vim or ~/vimfiles
(can work in $VIM and $VIMRUNTIME folder, but favor dropping it in your profile dir)
and use :TodoOpen to use

versions.release_notes: now use globpath( &rtp... to find icons
